title: Union Bank
content: I just needed to know what all we recieve after opening the account. iâ€™ve only received a letter but no card or a pin.

comments.body: Go to the Union Bank Pesit branch, give them your account number. They will check which has branch opened your account; go to that Union Bank branch and collect your card.

According to what I have enquired from the bank officials, we will get the card and cheque book delivered at the home address 

I have received my check book today at my address, awaiting debit card
Its mainly for the scholarship money and any money you win from activities you win. I guess talk to your office and they'll tell you the account number.
is it neccassary for kcet students as well, and if  i make where should i go report at clg like whts the procedure
